name: Aspirin

description: Dabigatran is a medication used to prevent blood clots.

description: Levothyroxine is a medication used to treat an underactive thyroid gland (hypothyroidism).

description: Liothyronine is a medication used to treat an underactive thyroid gland (hypothyroidism).

description: Thyroxine is a medication used to treat an underactive thyroid gland (hypothyroidism).

description: Desiccated thyroid extract is a medication used to treat an underactive thyroid gland (hypothyroidism).

name: Citalopram
description: Citalopram is a medication used to treat depression.

name: Escitalopram
description: Escitalopram is a medication used to treat depression.

name: Fluoxetine
description: Fluoxetine is a medication used to treat depression, panic attacks, obsessive compulsive disorder, bulimia nervosa, and premenstrual dysphoric disorder.

name: Sertraline
description: Sertraline is a medication used to treat depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder, panic disorder, and post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

name: Metoprolol
description: Metoprolol is a medication used to treat high blood pressure and prevent migraine headaches.

name: Propranolol
description: Propranolol is a medication used to treat high blood pressure, angina, atrial fibrillation, tremor, and certain types of migraine headaches.

name: Atenolol
description: Atenolol is a medication used to treat high blood pressure, angina, and to reduce the risk of death after a heart attack.

name: Carvedilol
description: Carvedilol is a medication used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to reduce the risk of death after a heart attack.

name: Metronidazole
description: Metronidazole is an antibiotic used to treat infections caused by bacteria or parasites.

name: Ciprofloxacin
description: Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

name: Doxycycline
description: Doxycycline is an antibiotic used to treat many different bacterial infections, such as acne, urinary tract infections, intestinal infections, eye infections, gonorrhea, chlamydia, periodontitis (gum disease), and others.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.

name: Fluticasone
description: Fluticasone is a corticosteroid used to reduce inflammation in the nasal passages and lungs.

name: Budesonide
description: Budesonide is a corticosteroid used to treat asthma, COPD, and inflammatory bowel disease.

name: Mometasone
description: Mometasone is a corticosteroid used to treat asthma, allergies, and skin conditions.

name: Prednisone
description: Prednisone is a corticosteroid used to treat conditions such as arthritis, blood disorders, breathing problems, severe allergies, skin diseases, cancer, eye problems, and immune system disorders.

name: Gabapentin
description: Gabapentin is a medication used to treat epilepsy, neuropathic pain, restless legs syndrome, and hot flashes.

name: Pregabalin
description: Pregabalin is a medication used to treat epilepsy, neuropathic pain, fibromyalgia, and generalized anxiety disorder.

name: Carbamazepine
description: Carbamazepine is a medication used primarily in the treatment of epilepsy and neuropathic pain.

name: Valproic acid
description: Valproic acid is a medication primarily used to treat epilepsy and bipolar disorder and to prevent migraine headaches.

name: Alprazolam
description: Alprazolam is a medication used to treat anxiety disorders, panic disorders, and anxiety caused by depression.

name: Lorazepam
description: Lorazepam is a medication used to treat anxiety disorders, trouble sleeping, active seizures including status epilepticus, alcohol withdrawal, and chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting.

name: Clonazepam
description: Clonazepam is a medication used to prevent and treat seizures, panic disorder, and for the movement disorder known as akathisia.

name: Diazepam
description: Diazepam is a medication used to treat anxiety, alcohol withdrawal syndrome, muscle spasms, seizures, trouble sleeping, restless legs syndrome, and benzodiazepine withdrawal.

name: Morphine
description: Morphine is a medication used to treat severe pain.

name: Oxycodone
description: Oxycodone is a medication used for the relief of moderate to severe pain.

name: Hydromorphone
description: Hydromorphone is a medication used to relieve moderate to severe pain.

name: Fentanyl
description: Fentanyl is a powerful synthetic opioid used as a pain medication and together with other medications for anesthesia.
